author: Cult of Mac - David Snow
title: Affordable new Qi2 wireless charger lineup keeps gadgets going | Flipboard
text: Affordable new Qi2 wireless charger lineup keeps gadgets going Accessories brand ESR stocked a new collection of Qi2 chargers for iPhone and other devices this week on Amazon. It should help you charge at MagSafe speed levels, but ESR Qi2 wireless chargers come at lower prices than many MagSafe chargers. This post contains affiliate links.
